verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you have <S%H2713>searched<s%> <S%H3045>me<s%>, and known me.
You <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3427>sitting<s%> and my <S%H6965>standing<s%>, you <S%H995>understand<s%> my <S%H7454>thoughts<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.
You <S%H2219>search<s%> my <S%H734>path<s%> and my lying <S%H7252>down<s%>, and are <S%H5532>acquainted<s%> with all my <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
For there is not a <S%H4405>word<s%> in my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, <S%H3068>but<s%>, behold, O Lord, you know it <S%H3045>altogether<s%>.
You have <S%H6696>beset<s%> me <S%H268>behind<s%> and <S%H6924>before<s%>, and <S%H7896>laid<s%> your hand upon <S%H3709>me<s%>.
Such <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is too <S%H6383>wonderful<s%> for <S%H7682>me<s%>; it is high, I cannot attain unto <S%H3201>it<s%>.
Where shall I <S%H3212>go<s%> from your <S%H7307>spirit<s%>? or where shall I <S%H1272>flee<s%> from your <S%H6440>presence<s%>?
If I ascend <S%H5266>up<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, you are <S%H3331>there<s%>: if I make my bed in <S%H7585>hell<s%>, behold, you are there.
If I <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%>, and <S%H7931>live<s%> in the outermost <S%H319>parts<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>;
Even there shall your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H3225>me<s%>, and your right hand shall hold <S%H270>me<s%>.
If I <S%H559>say<s%>, Surely the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H7779>cover<s%> <S%H3915>me<s%>; even the night shall be <S%H216>light<s%> about <S%H1157>me<s%>.

<S%H2822>Yes<s%>, the darkness <S%H2821>hides<s%> not from <S%H3915>you<s%>; but the night <S%H215>shines<s%> as the <S%H3117>day<s%>: the <S%H2825>darkness<s%> and the light are both alike to <S%H219>you<s%>.
For you have <S%H7069>possessed<s%> my <S%H3629>minds<s%>: you have <S%H5526>covered<s%> me in my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>womb<s%>.

I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3372>you<s%>; for I am fearfully and wonderfully <S%H6395>made<s%>: <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> are your <S%H4639>works<s%>; and that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> right <S%H3966>well<s%>.

My <S%H6108>substance<s%> was not <S%H3582>hid<s%> from <S%H6213>you<s%>, when I was made in <S%H5643>secret<s%>, and curiously <S%H7551>done<s%> in the lowest <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> did <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H1564>substance<s%>, yet being unperfect; and in your <S%H5612>book<s%> all my members were <S%H3789>written<s%>, which in <S%H3117>continuance<s%> were <S%H3335>fashioned<s%>, when as yet there was none of <S%H259>them<s%>.
How <S%H3365>precious<s%> also are your <S%H7454>thoughts<s%> unto <S%H410>me<s%>, O God! how <S%H6105>great<s%> is the sum of <S%H7218>them<s%>!
If I should <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H7235>them<s%>, they are more in number than the <S%H2344>sand<s%>: when I <S%H6974>awake<s%>, I am still with <S%H5750>you<s%>.
Surely you will <S%H6991>kill<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, O <S%H433>God<s%>: <S%H5493>depart<s%> from me <S%H1818>therefore<s%>, you bloody <S%H582>men<s%>.
For they <S%H559>speak<s%> against you <S%H4209>wickedly<s%>, and your <S%H6145>enemies<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> your name in <S%H7723>vain<s%>.
Do not I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, O Lord, that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H6962>you<s%>? and am not I grieved with those that rise up against <S%H8618>you<s%>?
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them with <S%H8503>perfect<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%>: I count them my <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
<S%H2713>Search<s%> <S%H410>me<s%>, O God, and <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%>: <S%H974>try<s%> <S%H3045>me<s%>, and know my <S%H8312>thoughts<s%>:
And <S%H7200>see<s%> if there be any <S%H6090>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H5148>me<s%>, and lead me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>.
